item.title: CLF
item.description: score:-4 Chances: Steel traders, automotive customers, and even United States Steel Corp. workers are hailing the iconic American companyâ€™s decision to sell to a Japanese rival, which indicates positive market sentiment and potential for growth. Ron Bloom, a director at Cleveland-Cliffs Inc, has increased his stake in the company, signaling confidence in the company’s future prospects.
